10  package de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.strategies;
11  
12  import java.util.SortedSet;
13  
14  import javax.swing.text.JTextComponent;
15  import javax.swing.text.StyledDocument;
16  
17  import org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair;
18  
19  /**
20   * Pojo to keep formatter specific values together.
21   *
22   * @author markiewb
23   * @author bahlef
24   */
25  public class FormatterAdvice {
26  	private final StyledDocument styledDocument;
27  
28  	private final SortedSet<Pair<Integer, Integer>> changedElements;
29  
30  	private final boolean forSave;
31  
32  	private final int selectionStart;
33  
34  	private final int selectionEnd;
35  
36  	private final int caret;
37  
38  	private final JTextComponent editor;
39  
40  	/**
41  	 * Creates a new {@link FormatterAdvice}.
42  	 *
43  	 * @param styledDocument the {@link StyledDocument} which should be formatted
44  	 * @param selectionStart offset where the selection starts, or {@code -1} if there is no selection
45  	 * @param selectionEnd   offset where the selection ends, or {@code -1} if there is no selection
46  	 * @param caret          the caret position when the formatting was invoked
47  	 * @param editor         the {@link JTextComponent} holding the given {@link StyledDocument}
48  	 */
49  	public FormatterAdvice(StyledDocument styledDocument, int selectionStart, int selectionEnd, int caret, JTextComponent editor) {
50  		this(styledDocument, null, false, selectionStart, selectionEnd, caret, editor);
51  	}
52  
53  	/**
54  	 * Creates a new {@link FormatterAdvice}.
55  	 *
56  	 * @param styledDocument  the {@link StyledDocument} which should be formatted
57  	 * @param changedElements a {@link SortedSet} of {@link Pair} objects as ranges which should be formatted, leaving everything outside of the ranges unformatted
58  	 * @param caret           the caret position when the formatting was invoked
59  	 * @param editor          the {@link JTextComponent} holding the given {@link StyledDocument}
60  	 */
61  	public FormatterAdvice(StyledDocument styledDocument, SortedSet<Pair<Integer, Integer>> changedElements, int caret, JTextComponent editor) {
62  		this(styledDocument, changedElements, true, -1, -1, caret, editor);
63  	}
64  
65  	private FormatterAdvice(StyledDocument styledDocument, SortedSet<Pair<Integer, Integer>> changedElements, boolean forSave, int selectionStart, int selectionEnd, int caret, JTextComponent editor) {
66  		this.styledDocument = styledDocument;
67  		this.changedElements = changedElements;
68  		this.forSave = forSave;
69  		this.selectionStart = selectionStart;
70  		this.selectionEnd = selectionEnd;
71  		this.caret = caret;
72  		this.editor = editor;
73  	}
74  
75  	/**
76  	 * Returns the {@link StyledDocument}.
77  	 *
78  	 * @return the {@link StyledDocument}
79  	 */
80  	public StyledDocument getStyledDocument() {
81  		return styledDocument;
82  	}
83  
84  	/**
85  	 * Returns the {@link SortedSet} of {@link Pair} ranges.
86  	 *
87  	 * @return the {@link SortedSet} of {@link Pair} ranges
88  	 */
89  	public SortedSet<Pair<Integer, Integer>> getChangedElements() {
90  		return changedElements;
91  	}
92  
93  	/**
94  	 * Return the {@code forSave} flag.
95  	 *
96  	 * @return the {@code forSave} flag
97  	 */
98  	public boolean isForSave() {
99  		return forSave;
100 	}
101 
102 	/**
103 	 * Returns the offset of the selection start.
104 	 *
105 	 * @return the offset of the selection start
106 	 */
107 	public int getSelectionStart() {
108 		return selectionStart;
109 	}
110 
111 	/**
112 	 * Returns the offset of the selection end.
113 	 *
114 	 * @return the offset of the selection end
115 	 */
116 	public int getSelectionEnd() {
117 		return selectionEnd;
118 	}
119 
120 	/**
121 	 * Returns the caret position.
122 	 *
123 	 * @return the caret position
124 	 */
125 	public int getCaret() {
126 		return caret;
127 	}
128 
129 	/**
130 	 * Returns the {@link JTextComponent}.
131 	 *
132 	 * @return the {@link JTextComponent}
133 	 */
134 	public JTextComponent getEditor() {
135 		return editor;
136 	}
137 }
